name: Nuclear Arms 3
description:
Craig Killbane is back! We last left our hero attempting to destroy the trash star. In the process he was sucked into a trash singularity and stranded in deep space. The ships engine's have been disabled and an army of alien skeletons are invading to take his nuclear technology. You play as Killbane as he attempts to fix the engine while fighting back the alien menace

This game follows the adventures of Craig Killbane. You can check out the first 2 parts of the adventure from our past Ludum Dare submissions:

Nuclear Arms -http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-32/?action=p...

Nuclear Arms 2, Garbage Day - http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...

This was our 3rd Ludum Dare game jam submission. It was also our first foray into making a 3D game. Our past experience allowed us to focus on trying some new things and this was the end result. We hope you like it!

Try and fix the ship to escape the alien menace!

Controls:

WASD - movement

Spacebar - jump

E - Interact/Pickup/Drop object

Left Click - Attack

Right Click - Throw held object
